original_title: Recess Monkey: Curious Circus Live at Teatro ZinZanni
overview: Recess Monkey and Seattle's Teatro ZinZanni present CURIOUS CIRCUS, the high-energy, invention-centric journey to the grand unveiling of the Exhibition of Ideas and Inventions! Today is a special day as Professor Loco, the Mother of Invention and the talented exhibitors prepare for the arrival of Doctor Aeroflot! Groove along with Recess Monkey, pick your jaw off the floor that the Step Sisters dance on, disbelieve your eyes as Alexander the Amazing shows his stuff and cross your fingers that Waldo will finally be able to reveal his secret! Filmed December 6, 2014 at Teatro ZinZanni's famed speigeltent in Seattle with a high energy audience!
title: Recess Monkey: Curious Circus Live at Teatro ZinZanni
